template.description: Sent when an account needs e-mail activation.
template.html:
Welcome %USERNAME%!

Account Activation

You successfully registered an account to this e-mail address, however you need to click the link below to activate your account:

%URL_ACTIVATE%

If you did not register this account or you want to cancel the registration, click the below link to delete the account:

%URL_DELETE%

Registration Details

IP used: %IP_ADDRESS%

Browser: %BROWSER%

Date/time: %DATE_TIME%
